testCase.requirementText: Schema file reference mets/structMap[@LABEL='CSIP']/div/div[@LABEL='Schemas']/fptr All file groups containing schemas described in the package are referenced via the relevant file group identifiers. One file group reference per fptr-element
testCase.description: All fileGrps with the @USE="Schemas" must also be presented in the structMap. CSIP100 and CSIP118 are intrinsically linked together and therefore is the same testcase.

rule.description: All fileGrps with the @USE="Schemas" must also be presented in the structMap via a fptr-element and an FILEID corresponding to the fileGrp-ID

error.message: All fileGrps with the @USE="Schemas" must be presented in the structMap via mets/structMap[@LABEL='CSIP']/div/div[@LABEL='Schemas']/fptr

package.name: fileGrp_Schemas_but_missing_structMap
package.description: A package where there is a fileGrp with @USE="Schemas" but there is no structMap [@LABEL='CSIP']/div/div[@LABEL='Schemas']/fptr FILEID

rule.description: A structMap[@LABEL='CSIP']/div/div[@LABEL='Schemas']/fptr must point to a fileGrp with @USE="Schemas"

error.message: The structMap[@LABEL='CSIP']/div/div[@LABEL='Schemas']/fptr points to a fileGrp that does not have @USE="Schemas"

package.name: structMap_does_not_point_at_Schemas
package.description: A package which has a Schemas filepointer that points to a filegroup that does not have @USE="Schemas"
